prompts.topic: If you could send a message to someone on the other side of the universe, what would you say?
What do you think the weather is like on other planets?
Have you ever looked at the stars and wondered if someone was looking back?
What is the longest you have ever gone without talking to someone?
If you could name a new star, what would you call it and why?
What is the most beautiful sky you have ever seen?
Do you think there is a sound in space that we just cannot hear?
What does home feel like to you?
If you could talk to your future self, what is the first thing you would ask?
What is something you wish you could explain to someone but never found the right words?
If the moon could talk, what do you think it would say about us?
What is the strangest way you have ever communicated with someone?
Do you think astronauts get homesick? What would you miss the most?
What is a memory you would want to send into space for aliens to find?
Have you ever felt like you and someone else were on completely different wavelengths?
If you woke up floating in space, what is the first thing you would want to see?
What is a song that you think should be broadcast to the entire galaxy?
Do you think silence can say more than words?
What do you think the sunrise looks like from Saturn?
If you could have a conversation with anyone, alive or dead, who would it be?
What is something small that makes you feel connected to the world?
Do you think we will ever truly understand what is beyond the stars?
What is the most important thing someone has ever said to you?
If you could live on a space station, what one thing would you bring from Earth?
What does the night sky make you think about?
Have you ever misunderstood someone and it turned into something better than what they actually said?
If you could see Earth from space right now, what part of the world would you look for first?
What would you write on a postcard to a stranger in another galaxy?
Do you think the universe is trying to tell us something?
What is a feeling that is hard to put into words?
If constellations could tell stories, what story do you think they would tell about tonight?
What is one thing you would want the whole world to hear at the same time?
Do you think there is someone out there right now looking at the same star as you?
What is the best conversation you have ever had?
If you could translate any animal language, which one would you choose?
What would you pack for a one-way trip to Mars?
Is there a word in another language that you wish existed in English?
What do you think happens to our words after we say them?
If shooting stars could grant wishes, what would you wish for right now?
What is a question you have always wanted someone to ask you?
If you could hear one sound from the past, what would it be?
What do you think the Earth sounds like from the outside?
If you could leave a voicemail for someone a thousand years from now, what would you say?
What is the most meaningful gift you have ever received?
Do you think light remembers everywhere it has been?
If you could orbit any planet for a day, which would you choose?
What is something you believed as a child that turned out to be more true than you expected?
If every person on Earth whispered at the same time, do you think space would hear it?
What is a place you have never been to but somehow feel connected to?
If you could bottle a moment in time, which one would you keep?
What is the kindest thing a stranger has ever done for you?
Do you think dreams are messages from somewhere else?
If you could paint the sky any color for a day, what would you choose?
What would you want carved on a plaque left on the moon?
Is there a sound that always makes you feel calm?
If the ocean could send a message to the sky, what do you think it would say?
What is a smell that instantly takes you back to a specific memory?
If you found a door floating in space, would you open it?
What is the most honest thing you have ever said?
Do you think two people can share a thought without speaking?
If you could listen to the heartbeat of the Earth, what rhythm do you think it would have?
What is the bravest thing you have ever done?
If gravity disappeared for one minute, what would you do?
What is a letter you have written but never sent?
Do you think there are colors in the universe that human eyes cannot see?
What is something you know to be true but cannot prove?
If you could float above a city at night, which city would you choose?
What is the last thing that made you laugh so hard you could not breathe?
If time had a taste, what do you think it would taste like?
What is a tradition you wish more people knew about?
If your life had a soundtrack, what song would be playing right now?
What is something you have forgiven but not forgotten?
If the northern lights could speak, what language do you think they would use?
What is the most peaceful place you have ever been?
If you could add one room to your home that defied physics, what would it be?
Do you think the universe has an edge, or does it just keep going?
What is a conversation you keep replaying in your head?
If you could understand one thing about the deep ocean, what would it be?
What is something you do when no one is watching?
If satellites could dream, what do you think they would dream about?
What is a promise you have made to yourself?
If you could walk on clouds, where would you go?
What is the most surprising thing you have learned about yourself?
If the wind carried voices, whose voice would you want to hear?
What does the word distance mean to you?
If you could freeze one season forever in one place, which season and where?
What is a story you have never told anyone?
If black holes had feelings, do you think they would be lonely?
What is something ordinary that you find extraordinary?
If you could receive a signal from another civilization, what would you hope it said?
What is the most comforting thing someone could say to you right now?
If you could witness any event in the history of the universe, what would you choose?
What is something you wish you had said to someone when you had the chance?
If rain on another planet sounded like music, what instrument would it sound like?
What is a small habit that brings you joy?
If the stars rearranged themselves to spell one word tonight, what word would you want to see?
What is the most important thing you have unlearned?
If you could put a telescope anywhere in the universe, where would you point it?
What is a question that changes depending on when you ask it?
If you and a stranger shared a minute of silence, do you think you would understand each other?
